    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3

    Facet DetailedHotelSearchCriteria_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3:DetailedHotelSearchCriteria_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<DetailedHotelSearchCriteria xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" aDACompliantInd="true" exactMatchInd="true" hotelCodeContext="Sabre" petsAllowedInd="true" smokingRoomsInd="true" tTIcode="1234" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3">
    <FeaturesAccessibility quantity="1234">
        <ota2-0400:Description name="paragraph name" number="2345">
            <ota2-0400:Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</ota2-0400:Text>
            <ota2-0400:Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="4567" sort="3456" version="Example String Value">
                <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
                <ota2-0400:ImageRef>image_1</ota2-0400:ImageRef>
                <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</ota2-0400:URL>
                <ota2-0400:Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</ota2-0400:Details>
                <ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
                    <ota2-0400:FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="1234" subTitle="Example String Value"/>
                </ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription>
                <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
                <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                    <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
                    <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                    <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
                </ota2-0400:Email>
                <ota2-0400:Dimensions height="3456" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="2345"/>
                <ota2-0400:File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="4567"/>
                <ota2-0400:Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
            </ota2-0400:Image>
            <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</ota2-0400:URL>
            <ota2-0400:ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="2345" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
            <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" purge="2011-01-24">2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
        </ota2-0400:Description>
        <AccessibilityFeaturesDetail>
            <AccessibilityFeatures>Accessibility to goods and services</AccessibilityFeatures>
            <Description language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Description>
        </AccessibilityFeaturesDetail>
    </FeaturesAccessibility>
    <BedType>Dorm bed</BedType>
    <HotelAmenity codeContext="Example String Value" description="Example String Value">Example String Value</HotelAmenity>
    <RoomAmenities codeContext="Example String Value" description="Example String Value">Example String Value</RoomAmenities>
    <Rating>3.5</Rating>
</DetailedHotelSearchCriteria>

      {
  "DetailedHotelSearchCriteria" : {
    "hotelCodeContext" : "Sabre",

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Features
        Features to be used in the search.
        Details
        Type Features
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        BedType
        Bed type for the search.
        Details
        Type BedType_Enum
        Example Value Dorm bed
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        HotelAmenity
        A hotel amenity to be included in the search.
        Details
        Type Code
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        RoomAmenities
        A room amenity to be included in the search.
        Details
        Type Code
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 100
        Rating
        The minimum hotel rating value of the hotels to be returned (e.g. only return hotels with a 3.5 rating or higher).
        Details
        Type RatingValue
        Example Value 3.5
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        hotelCodeContext
        A text field used to communicate the context (or source of - ex Sabre, Galileo, Worldspan, Amadeus) the HotelReferenceGroup codes.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Sabre
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        tTIcode
        Note: This code is maintained by the Travel Technology Initiative (TTI) and provides a unique way to identify a property across a multiplicity of channels, service providers, tour companies, representation companies and third parties involved in the booking, administration and fulfillment of travel within the hospitality industry. For more information: http://www.tti.org/tticodes.html
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        petsAllowedInd
        When true, pets are allowed at the facility.
        smokingRoomsInd
        When true, this hotel facility offers smoking rooms.
        aDACompliantInd
        When true, this hotel facility is ADA compliant.
        exactMatchInd
        When true, only properties/rate plans that exactly match the search criteria should be returned.
